name: A-round Alpha Demo
description:
PLS READ>This game is an Alpha demo of the video game A-round: made By Benzano547

PLS READ>Also pls send glitch comments about glitches in the game that I will fix.

PLS READ>It will say don't run the file but please trust me it's not a virus I'm not an old man who likes doing stuff like that ok.

PLS READ>DISCLAMER: There is a glitch if you don't finish the slime boss without a right attack the final cutscene won't play and I don't know how to fix it so make sure to kill the slime boss with a right attack
